Package de.esoco.lib.logging

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileLogging
    A log aspect that appends log records to a file.
    Log
    Main class of a logging framework that is as simple to use as possible.
    LogAspect<T>
    This is a base class for the implementation of specific aspects of logging, like logging to a database or external systems.
    LogLevelFilter
    A predicate implementation that filters log levels.
    LogRecord
    Package-internal data object for log records.
    LogRecordFormat
    Special token string transformation that transforms log records into strings.
    StreamLogging
    A log aspect that writes log data to streams.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogExtent
    An enumeration of the possible extents to which logging should be performed.
    LogLevel
    Enumeration of the available log levels.
